item.description:
Meetup at The Grand Cru Wine Bar & Grill at the Cape Codder Resort for Dinner & Entertainment.

The menu features creatively prepared regional fare in a casual, yet elegant atmosphere with an extensive list of tapas, salads, local fish and shellfish, and desserts made in-house.

Known for their list of carefully selected fine wines by the bottle, glass or 2 oz. taste, but they also boast the best martini list on Cape Cod, as well as classic cocktails, ports, cognacs, single malt scotches and ice-cold bottled and draught beer.

Friday night features the Ibis Trio Jazz Band!

Another Good Time to Look Forward To!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a pink hat that says, "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun"!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Cape Codder Resort ---Grand Cru Wine Bar & Grill Dinner & Entertainment
